## Interaction dataset:

Name of dataset comprises two numbers, first one for study and second
for network (in case there is more than one). Numbers are given in
"selected_individual_networks.xlsx" and followd by "\_int" (e.g.
01_01_int.csv).

First column name is "ind" and has the plant ID.\
Animal species go in columns and their names go in full with "\_" in
between genus and species.
